verbose_text: Taken together, these data were consistent with the p107/109 antibody specifically targeting phosphorylated Ephexin5 in neurons, leading us to conclude that Ephexin5 is phosphorylated at serine residues 107 and 109 during development and that this phosphorylation can be performed in hippocampal neurons by an endogenous neuronal kinase.
evidence: Ephexin5 is phosphorylated at serine residues 107
